fcutils 0.0.0.9013
  • Reference

    Create xts and fill with values

    make_xts.Rd

    Create xts and fill with values

    Usage

    make_xts(start = bnk_start, end = NULL, per = "year", val = NA_real_)

    Arguments

    start

    date of series start (character: "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyyqq", "yyyy")

    end

    date of series end (character: "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyyqq", "yyyy")

    per

    periodicity of series (character: "year" - default) if date format of start is quarterly, automatically set to "quarter"

    val

    values to fill in (numeric scalar, vector, or tibble)

    Value

    an xts series

    Details

    when end is missing, but val is a vector of more than one element, the end date is automatically determined by the length of the val vector. if end is missing and val is a scalar, the end date is set to bnk_end. if end is missing the remaining arguments have to be named. if val is a tibble, the end date is automatically determined by the number of rows in the tibble.

    Examples

    make_xts()
#>            value
#> 1970-01-01    NA
#> 1971-01-01    NA
#> 1972-01-01    NA
#> 1973-01-01    NA
#> 1974-01-01    NA
#> 1975-01-01    NA
#> 1976-01-01    NA
#> 1977-01-01    NA
#> 1978-01-01    NA
#> 1979-01-01    NA
#> 1980-01-01    NA
#> 1981-01-01    NA
#> 1982-01-01    NA
#> 1983-01-01    NA
#> 1984-01-01    NA
#> 1985-01-01    NA
#> 1986-01-01    NA

#> 2002-01-01    NA
#> 2003-01-01    NA
#> 2004-01-01    NA
#> 2005-01-01    NA
#> 2006-01-01    NA
#> 2007-01-01    NA
#> 2008-01-01    NA
#> 2009-01-01    NA

make_xts(val = 0, per = "m")
#>            value
#> 1970-01-01     0
#> 1970-02-01     0
#> 1970-03-01     0
#> 1970-04-01     0
#> 1970-05-01     0
#> 1970-06-01     0
#> 1970-07-01     0
#> 1970-08-01     0
#> 1970-09-01     0
#> 1970-10-01     0
#>        ...      
#> 2060-03-01     0
#> 2060-04-01     0
#> 2060-05-01     0
#> 2060-06-01     0
#> 2060-07-01     0
#> 2060-08-01     0
#> 2060-09-01     0
#> 2060-10-01     0
#> 2060-11-01     0
#> 2060-12-01     0
make_xts(start = 20100101, per = "quarter", val = 0)
#>            value
#> 2010-01-01     0
#> 2010-04-01     0
#> 2010-07-01     0
#> 2010-10-01     0
#> 2011-01-01     0
#> 2011-04-01     0
#> 2011-07-01     0
#> 2011-10-01     0
#> 2012-01-01     0
#> 2012-04-01     0
#>        ...      
#> 2058-07-01     0
#> 2058-10-01     0
#> 2059-01-01     0
#> 2059-04-01     0
#> 2059-07-01     0
#> 2059-10-01     0
#> 2060-01-01     0
#> 2060-04-01     0
#> 2060-07-01     0
#> 2060-10-01     0
make_xts(start = 2010.1, per = "q", val = 1:10)
#>            value
#> 2010-01-01     1
#> 2010-04-01     2
#> 2010-07-01     3
#> 2010-10-01     4
#> 2011-01-01     5
#> 2011-04-01     6
#> 2011-07-01     7
#> 2011-10-01     8
#> 2012-01-01     9
#> 2012-04-01    10
make_xts(2010.1, val = 1:10) # automatically set per = "quarter"
#>            value
#> 2010-01-01     1
#> 2010-04-01     2
#> 2010-07-01     3
#> 2010-10-01     4
#> 2011-01-01     5
#> 2011-04-01     6
#> 2011-07-01     7
#> 2011-10-01     8
#> 2012-01-01     9
#> 2012-04-01    10
make_xts(start = "2010-01-01", per = "m", val = 0)
#>            value
#> 2010-01-01     0
#> 2010-02-01     0
#> 2010-03-01     0
#> 2010-04-01     0
#> 2010-05-01     0
#> 2010-06-01     0
#> 2010-07-01     0
#> 2010-08-01     0
#> 2010-09-01     0
#> 2010-10-01     0
#>        ...      
#> 2060-03-01     0
#> 2060-04-01     0
#> 2060-05-01     0
#> 2060-06-01     0
#> 2060-07-01     0
#> 2060-08-01     0
#> 2060-09-01     0
#> 2060-10-01     0
#> 2060-11-01     0
#> 2060-12-01     0
make_xts(start = 201001, per = "q",
         val = tibble::tibble(E_NF_HON = c(1:10), ECT_HI = c(11:20)))
#>            E_NF_HON ECT_HI
#> 2010-01-01        1     11
#> 2010-04-01        2     12
#> 2010-07-01        3     13
#> 2010-10-01        4     14
#> 2011-01-01        5     15
#> 2011-04-01        6     16
#> 2011-07-01        7     17
#> 2011-10-01        8     18
#> 2012-01-01        9     19
#> 2012-04-01       10     20
